short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to add subtitles available to Russian YouTube movie or series

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds subtitles to Russian YouTube videos automatically where the copyright holder decided not to add subtitles, thus depriving foreigners of watching these videos and learning Russian from them.

I write subtitles personally in my spare time, so new subtitles are not added very quickly. Links to videos that already have subtitles ready, I will put in this description and will periodically update this list. 

All you need to do to make subtitles appear is to install the extension and go to the videos from the list below. The subtitles will appear automatically. For convenience, disable the auto-generated YouTube subtitles, because they can overlap the subtitles generated by this extension.

List of series here: https://slokerdev.com 
The series will be updated as they are translated and added, so add this site to your bookmarks.
